trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage"></xref> adapter for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage"></xref>無線標記語言 (WML) 裝置配接器設定配接器。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of any additional HTTP headers by which caching is varied.
trans-unit.target: 傳回之快取會改變任何其他 HTTP 標頭的清單。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> classes inherit this property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>類別會繼承這個屬性從<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: These implementations return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這些實作會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Output Caching" section in [Mobile Text Writer Rendering Best Practices](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28893297-2c45-4c57-a2b3-9cdd5898f988).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 輸出快取 」 一節[行動文字寫入器呈現的最佳作法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28893297-2c45-4c57-a2b3-9cdd5898f988)。

trans-unit.source: A list of any additional HTTP headers by which caching is varied.
trans-unit.target: 依據變更快取任何其他 HTTP 標頭的清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets persisted data between requests through the use of the URL query string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定透過使用 URL 查詢字串的要求之間的持續性的資料。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This property is populated when a valid <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> type is configured as an attribute of the `< mobileControls >` configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會填入時有效<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>類型已設定的屬性為`< mobileControls >`組態項目。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Data persisted between requests through the use of the URL query string.
trans-unit.target: 透過使用 URL 查詢字串的要求之間保存的資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回的文字寫入器適用於指定配接器。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: A text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 適用於指定配接器的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Called to determine the postback data collection.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以判斷回傳資料集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Because some devices handle postback differently from others, this method allows the adapter to modify the collection.
trans-unit.target: 某些裝置處理回傳的方式不同，因為這個方法可讓配接器來修改集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> implementations of this method gather control data if the post originated from a different page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>如果 post 要求來自不同的網頁，這個方法的實作會收集控制資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter> implementation performs CHTML-specific handling of postback data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>實作所執行的回傳資料 CHTML 特定處理。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object that contains request information, such as HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"> </xref>物件，其中包含要求的資訊，例如 HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源識別項。

trans-unit.source: Argument identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的引數識別項。

trans-unit.source: Collection of postback data from the request object.
trans-unit.target: 來自要求物件的回傳資料集合。

trans-unit.source: The modified postback data collection.
trans-unit.target: 修改過的回傳資料集合。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: 評估是否裝置配接器集套用至指定的要求。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: |Class|Returns|Preferred rendering type|Check value of JavaScript property| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|Not applicable.|
trans-unit.target: |類別 |傳回 |慣用轉譯類型 |檢查 JavaScript 屬性的值 | |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|檢查<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>屬性的值是否<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。 |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|檢查<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>屬性的值是否<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。 |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>屬性會傳回`false`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|檢查<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>屬性的值是否<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>。 |Not applicable.|</xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The current request context.
trans-unit.target: 目前的要求內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果裝置配接器設定會套用至指定的要求。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called if an unhandled exception occurs during the life cycle of the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果未處理的例外狀況，就會發生頁面生命週期期間，呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: An adapter can choose to handle the exception and render an error message.
trans-unit.target: 配接器可以處理的例外狀況，並顯示錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The method returns `true` if it handles the error.
trans-unit.target: 方法會傳回`true`如果它會處理錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> class, this implementation does nothing and returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>類別，這個實作不做任何動作，並傳回`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> class, this implementation formats the error for WML and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>類別，此實作中的 WML 格式錯誤，並傳回`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: System exception object.
trans-unit.target: 系統例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: The text writer
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if it handles the exception.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果它處理例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during postback.
trans-unit.target: 在回傳期間呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: It allows a page adapter to handle a postback event by itself.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓頁面配接器自行處理回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter.HandlePagePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and HandlePagePostBackEvent methods return false.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter.HandlePagePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和 HandlePagePostBackEvent 方法會傳回 false。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter.HandlePagePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源識別項。

trans-unit.source: Name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether or not the specified form is to be rendered as part of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的表單要轉譯為目前要求的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> class, only the active form is rendered for each request.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>類別，作用中的表單會轉譯為每個要求。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> class, multiple forms can be combined as cards into a single deck, if size permits.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>類別，多個表單可以結合為卡到單一的投影片，如果允許的大小。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Programmatic name of the form.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式在表單的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified form is to be rendered as part of the current request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的表單呈現為目前的要求; 的一部分否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a page weight, based on the device's screen size, which is appropriate for the target device.
trans-unit.target: 傳回頁面重量，根據裝置的螢幕大小，也就是適用於目標裝置。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in form pagination.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用於表單編頁。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: A page weight, based on the device's screen size, which is appropriate for the target device.
trans-unit.target: 頁面權重，根據裝置的螢幕大小，也就是適用於目標裝置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage"></xref> to which the adapter is attached.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage"></xref>来附加配接器。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The page associated with the device adapter.
trans-unit.target: 與裝置配接器相關聯的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns whether items from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary*> property are persisted in the query string.
trans-unit.target: 設定或傳回是否項目從<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary*>屬性會保存在查詢字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: By default, this value is `true` if the `CookielessDataDictionaryType` entry in the `MobileControls` configuration section of Web.config is set to a valid dictionary type.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個值是`true`如果`CookielessDataDictionaryType`中的項目`MobileControls`組態區段的 Web.config 設定為有效的字典類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if items from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary*> property are persisted in the query string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目從<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary*>屬性會保留在查詢字串; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary*>

trans-unit.target: 產生目標特定標記為附加控制項配接器的控制項。

trans-unit.target: 呈現指定的表單。

trans-unit.target: 表單配接器會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器。

trans-unit.target: 要呈現的表單。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage"></xref> is rendering multiple forms as cards of the same deck.
trans-unit.target: 傳回是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage"></xref>為相同花色的牌的多種形式呈現。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the page is rendering multiple forms as cards of the same deck; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果頁面會呈現為相同的紙牌花色; 卡的多個表單，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
